title: Drugs, use or abuse

description: Beginning with various types of beneficial drugs, the film moves to excessive use, stimulants and depressants, damaging chemicals in drugs, psychological dependence and forms of harmful drugs. Presents basic information about drugs and moves the viewer towards their own conclusion.
